ingredient_list.text: 1l water, ideally 700ml should be chilled or ice

method.text: Put 300ml of water in a pot with the sugar, salt and any additions and heat to dissolve the salt and sugar (This step should even work with less water as you can dissolve 350g of salt, or 2000g of sugar In a liter of water at 20C)
Take off the heat, add the rest of the water or ice
Chill further in the fridge if necessary to bring the temperature down to around 5C
